Uses of Package
mph.connection

  • Packages that use mph.connection 
    Package Description
    mph.connection  
  • Classes in mph.connection used by mph.connection 
    Class and Description
    ConnectionManager
    This singleton class is used to set up a RMI connection with the Server module.
    ProfessorManager
    This singleton class initializes the local interface of the Professor and contains the methods of that interface, which are implemented by the Server.
    It implements ProfessorManagerRemote.
    StudentManager
    This class initializes the local interface of the Student and contains the methods of that interface, which are implemented by the Server.
    It implements StudentManagerRemote.
